trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Reprezentuje kolekcję <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> obiektów.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Ta klasa nie może być dziedziczona.

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> store is opened, the result is represented by an X509Certificate2Collection object.
trans-unit.target: Gdy <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>otworzyć magazynu, wynik jest reprezentowany przez obiekt X509Certificate2Collection.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>

trans-unit.source: If you are familiar with the unmanaged Cryptographic API constructs, you can think of an X509Certificate2Collection as a memory store of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> objects.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli znasz niezarządzane konstrukcje kryptograficznego interfejsu API można traktować X509Certificate2Collection jako magazyn o pamięci <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>obiektów.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> class without any <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> information.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> klasy bez żadnej <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> informacji.

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates an empty <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object, which is unlike the other constructors that use certificate or collection information to create the object.
trans-unit.target: Ten konstruktor tworzy pustą <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>obiektu, który różni się od innych konstruktorów używających certyfikatu lub zbierania informacji do utworzenia obiektu.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> class using an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> przy użyciu <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> obiektu.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object to start the collection from.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> Obiekt, aby uruchomić do kolekcji.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> class using an array of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> przy użyciu tablicy <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> obiektów.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Tablica <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> obiektów.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> class using the specified certificate collection.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> przy użyciu kolekcji określonego certyfikatu.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> Obiektu.

trans-unit.source: Adds an object to the end of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Dodaje obiekt na koniec <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method adds an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> object to a collection and returns the index location of the certificate.
trans-unit.target: Ta metoda dodaje <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>obiektu do kolekcji i zwraca lokalizacji indeksu certyfikatu.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>

trans-unit.source: An X.509 certificate represented as an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Certyfikat X.509 reprezentowane jako <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> obiektu.

trans-unit.source: The index at which the certificate has been added.
trans-unit.target: Indeks, w którym certificate został dodany.

trans-unit.source: certificate is .
trans-unit.target: certificateis .

trans-unit.source: Adds multiple <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> objects in an array to the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Dodaje wielu <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> obiektów w macierzy <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> obiektu.

trans-unit.source: Use this method if you have an array of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> objects to add to an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object.
trans-unit.target: Użyj tej metody, jeśli masz tablicę <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>obiekty do dodania do <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>obiektu.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>

trans-unit.source: The AddRange and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A> methods process requests transactionally, so that if a single add or remove fails, the entire operation is aborted.
trans-unit.target: AddRange i <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A>metody przetwarzania transakcyjnie, żądań, tak że jeśli pojedynczy Dodaj lub usuń zakończy się niepowodzeniem, cała operacja została przerwana.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Tablica <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> obiektów.

trans-unit.source: certificates is .
trans-unit.target: certificatesis .

trans-unit.source: Adds multiple <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> objects in an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object to another <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Dodaje wielu <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> obiekty w <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> obiektu do innego <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> obiektu.

trans-unit.source: Use this method if you have certificates in an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object that you want to add to another <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object.
trans-unit.target: Użyj tej metody, jeśli masz certyfikaty <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>obiekt, który chcesz dodać do innej <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>obiektu.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A> methods process requests transactionally, so that if a single add or remove fails, the entire operation is aborted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A>i <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A>metody przetwarzania transakcyjnie, żądań, tak że jeśli pojedynczy Dodaj lub usuń zakończy się niepowodzeniem, cała operacja została przerwana.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> Obiektu.

trans-unit.source: certificates is .
trans-unit.target: certificatesis .

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object contains a specific certificate.
trans-unit.target: Określa, czy <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> obiekt zawiera określonego certyfikatu.

trans-unit.source: This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to the <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ta metoda wykonuje wyszukiwanie liniowe; w związku z tym Średni czas wykonania jest proporcjonalny do <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>Właściwości.</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: That is, this method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Ta metoda jest O (`n`) operację, której `n` <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>.</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method determines equality by calling the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Ta metoda określa równości, wywołując <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metody.</xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> Obiekt do zlokalizowania w kolekcji.

trans-unit.source: if the contains the specified certificate; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Jeśli zawiera określony certificate ; w przeciwnym razie .

trans-unit.source: certificate is .
trans-unit.target: certificateis .

trans-unit.source: Exports X.509 certificate information into a byte array.
trans-unit.target: Eksportuje informacje certyfikatu X.509 do tablicy typu byte.

trans-unit.source: This method supports content types that do not require a password.
trans-unit.target: Ta metoda obsługuje typy zawartości, które nie wymagają hasła.

trans-unit.source: A supported <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obsługiwanej <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType"> </xref> obiektu.

trans-unit.source: X.509 certificate information in a byte array.
trans-unit.target: Informacje o certyfikacie X.509 w tablicy bajtów.

trans-unit.source: Exports X.509 certificate information into a byte array using a password.
trans-unit.target: Eksportuje informacje certyfikatu X.509 do tablicy typu byte, przy użyciu hasła.

trans-unit.source: This method supports the following <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> types: - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>
trans-unit.target: Ta metoda obsługuje następujące <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>typy:- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>

trans-unit.source: A supported <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obsługiwanej <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType"> </xref> obiektu.

trans-unit.source: A string used to protect the byte array.
trans-unit.target: Ciąg używany do ochrony tablicy bajtów.

trans-unit.source: X.509 certificate information in a byte array.
trans-unit.target: Informacje o certyfikacie X.509 w tablicy bajtów.

trans-unit.source: The certificate is unreadable, the content is invalid or, in the case of a certificate requiring a password, the private key could not be exported because the password provided was incorrect.
trans-unit.target: Certyfikat jest niemożliwe do odczytania, zawartość jest nieprawidłowa lub, w przypadku certyfikatu Wymaganie hasła, klucz prywatny nie można wyeksportować, ponieważ podane hasło jest niepoprawne.

trans-unit.source: Searches an object using the search criteria specified by the enumeration and the findValue object.
trans-unit.target: Wyszukiwanie przy użyciu kryteria wyszukiwania, określone przez wyliczenie i findValue obiektu.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to find <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> objects if no user interaction is needed.
trans-unit.target: Ta metoda służy do znalezienia <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>obiekty, jeśli jest potrzebna, bez interakcji użytkownika.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>

trans-unit.source: Use the Find method to allow the user to select <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> objects.
trans-unit.target: Użyj metody Find, aby zezwolić użytkownikowi na wybranie <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>obiektów.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>

trans-unit.source: Note that this method can be used in a cascading or nested style, narrowing the search criteria with each call to the method.
trans-unit.target: Należy pamiętać, że ta metoda może być używany w kaskadowego lub zagnieżdżony stylu zawęzić kryteria wyszukiwania przy każdym wywołaniu metody.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Jeden z <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType"> </xref> wartości.

trans-unit.source: The search criteria as an object.
trans-unit.target: Kryteria wyszukiwania jako obiekt.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to allow only valid certificates to be returned from the search; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Aby zezwolić tylko prawidłowe certyfikaty mają być zwracane przez wyszukiwanie; w przeciwnym razie <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> Obiektu.

trans-unit.source: findType is invalid.
trans-unit.target: findTypejest nieprawidłowy.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Zwraca moduł wyliczający, który można wykonać iterację <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> obiektu.

trans-unit.source: Enumerators allow read-only access to data in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Moduły wyliczające zezwolić na dostęp tylko do odczytu do danych w kolekcji.

trans-unit.source: Enumerators cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: Wyliczenia nie można zmodyfikować kolekcji źródłowej.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Enumerator"></xref> object that can iterate through the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Enumerator"> </xref> Obiekt, który można wykonać iterację <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> obiektu.

trans-unit.source: Imports a certificate in the form of a byte array into a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Importuje certyfikat w postaci tablicy bajtów w <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> obiektu.

trans-unit.source: This method imports a certificate in the form of a byte array into a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object.
trans-unit.target: Ta metoda importuje certyfikat w postaci tablicy bajtów w <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>obiektu.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>

trans-unit.source: This method supports the following <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> types: - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>
trans-unit.target: Ta metoda obsługuje następujące <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>typy:- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>

trans-unit.source: A byte array containing data from an X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Tablica bajtów zawierająca dane z certyfikatu X.509.

trans-unit.source: Imports a certificate file into a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Importuje plik certyfikatu do <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> obiektu.

trans-unit.source: This method supports the following <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> types: - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>
trans-unit.target: Ta metoda obsługuje następujące <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>typy:- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>

trans-unit.source: The name of the file containing the certificate information.
trans-unit.target: Nazwa pliku zawierającego informacje o certyfikacie.

trans-unit.source: Imports a certificate, in the form of a byte array that requires a password to access the certificate, into a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Importuje certyfikat w postaci tablicy bajtów, który wymaga hasła w celu dostępu do certyfikatu w <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> obiektu.

trans-unit.source: This method can be used with a PFX/PKCS12 binary large object (BLOB) protected by a password.
trans-unit.target: Tej metody można użyć z PFX/PKCS12 dużego obiektu binarnego (BLOB) chroniony hasłem.

trans-unit.source: Key containers associated with certificates in the PFX/PKCS12 BLOB can be created and the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags> value can be used to control this process.
trans-unit.target: Kontenery kluczy skojarzonych z certyfikatami w obiekcie BLOB PFX/PKCS12 mogą być tworzone i <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags>wartość może być używana do sterowania tego procesu.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags>

trans-unit.source: Note that if you do not create a key container, the private key is not persisted.
trans-unit.target: Należy pamiętać, że jeśli nie utworzysz kontener klucza, klucz prywatny nie jest trwały.

trans-unit.source: This method imports a certificate byte array into a collection of certificates.
trans-unit.target: Ta metoda importuje certyfikat tablica bajtów do kolekcji certyfikatów.

trans-unit.source: This method supports the following <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> types: - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>
trans-unit.target: Ta metoda obsługuje następujące <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>typy:- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>

trans-unit.source: A byte array containing data from an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Tablica bajtów zawierająca dane z <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> obiektu.

trans-unit.source: The password required to access the certificate information.
trans-unit.target: Hasło wymagane do uzyskania dostępu do informacji certyfikatu.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that control how and where the certificate is imported.
trans-unit.target: Bitowe połączenie wartości wyliczenia, które kontrolują, jak i gdzie certyfikat został zaimportowany.

trans-unit.source: Imports a certificate file that requires a password into a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Importuje plik certyfikatu, który wymaga hasła do <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> obiektu.

trans-unit.source: This method can be used with a PFX/PKCS12 file or other certificate files that require a password.
trans-unit.target: Tej metody można użyć z pliku PFX/PKCS12 lub innych plików certyfikatów, które wymagają hasła.

trans-unit.source: Key containers associated with certificates in the PFX/PKCS12 file can be created and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags> value can be used to control this process.
trans-unit.target: Kontenery kluczy skojarzonych z certyfikatami w pliku PFX/PKCS12 mogą być tworzone i <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags>wartość może być używana do sterowania tego procesu.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509KeyStorageFlags>

trans-unit.source: Note that if you do not create a key container, the private key is not persisted.
trans-unit.target: Należy pamiętać, że jeśli nie utworzysz kontener klucza, klucz prywatny nie jest trwały.

trans-unit.source: Note that a PFX/PKCS12 file can contain more than one certificate.
trans-unit.target: Należy pamiętać, że plik PFX/PKCS12 może zawierać więcej niż jeden certyfikat.

trans-unit.source: This method imports the first certificate associated with the private key or, if no private key is found, the first certificate found.
trans-unit.target: Ta metoda importuje pierwszy certyfikat skojarzony z kluczem prywatnym lub, jeśli zostanie znaleziony żaden klucz prywatny, pierwszy znaleziony certyfikat.

trans-unit.source: This method supports the following <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> types: - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>
trans-unit.target: Ta metoda obsługuje następujące <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>typy:- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType></xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509ContentType>

trans-unit.source: The name of the file containing the certificate information.
trans-unit.target: Nazwa pliku zawierającego informacje o certyfikacie.

trans-unit.source: The password required to access the certificate information.
trans-unit.target: Hasło wymagane do uzyskania dostępu do informacji certyfikatu.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that control how and where the certificate is imported.
trans-unit.target: Bitowe połączenie wartości wyliczenia, które kontrolują, jak i gdzie certyfikat został zaimportowany.

trans-unit.source: Inserts an object into the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Wstawia obiektu do <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> obiektu pod określonym indeksem.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A> property already equals the capacity of the list, the capacity is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array before the new element is inserted.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>Właściwości jest już równa pojemności listy, pojemność jest podwójny przez automatyczne ponowne przydzielanie tablicy wewnętrznej przed wstawieniem nowego elementu.</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `index` is equal to <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>, `certificate` is added to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli `index` jest równa <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>, `certificate` zostanie dodany na końcu kolekcji.</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which to insert `certificate`.
trans-unit.target: Liczony od zera indeks, w której mają zostać wstawione `certificate`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object to insert.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> Obiekt do wstawienia.

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: indexjest mniejsza od zera.

trans-unit.source: -or- index is greater than the property.
trans-unit.target: - lub - index jest większa niż właściwości.

trans-unit.source: The collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Kolekcja jest tylko do odczytu.

trans-unit.source: -or- The collection has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: - lub - kolekcja ma stały rozmiar.

trans-unit.source: certificate is .
trans-unit.target: certificateis .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera lub ustawia element pod określonym indeksem.

trans-unit.source: This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[index]`.
trans-unit.target: Ta właściwość umożliwia dostęp do określonego elementu w kolekcji przy użyciu następującej składni: `myCollection[index]`.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to get or set.
trans-unit.target: Liczony od zera indeks elementu do pobrania lub ustawienia.

trans-unit.source: The element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Element pod określonym indeksem.

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: indexjest mniejsza od zera.

trans-unit.source: -or- index is equal to or greater than the property.
trans-unit.target: - lub - index jest równa lub większa niż właściwości.

trans-unit.source: index is .
trans-unit.target: indexis .

trans-unit.source: Removes the first occurrence of a certificate from the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Usuwa pierwsze wystąpienie certyfikat od <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> obiektu.

trans-unit.source: This method removes the first occurrence of a certificate.
trans-unit.target: Ta metoda usuwa pierwsze wystąpienie certyfikatu.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> object to be removed from the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> Obiektu do usunięcia z <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> obiektu.

trans-unit.source: certificate is .
trans-unit.target: certificateis .

trans-unit.source: Removes multiple <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> objects in an array from an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Usuwa wielu <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> obiektów w tablicy z <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> obiektu.

trans-unit.source: Use this method if you have an array of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> objects to remove from an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object.
trans-unit.target: Użyj tej metody, jeśli masz tablicę <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>obiektów, aby usunąć z <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>obiektu.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A> and RemoveRange methods process requests transactionally, so that if a single add or remove fails, the entire operation is aborted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A>I RemoveRange metody przetwarzania transakcyjnie, żądań, tak że jeśli pojedynczy Dodaj lub usuń zakończy się niepowodzeniem, cała operacja została przerwana.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Tablica <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> obiektów.

trans-unit.source: certificates is .
trans-unit.target: certificatesis .

trans-unit.source: Removes multiple <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> objects in an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object from another <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Usuwa wielu <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> obiekty w <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> obiektu z innego <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> obiektu.

trans-unit.source: Use this method if you have certificates in an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object that you want to remove from another <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> object.
trans-unit.target: Użyj tej metody, jeśli masz certyfikaty <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>obiekt, który chcesz usunąć z innego <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>obiektu.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A> methods process requests transactionally, so that if a single add or remove fails, the entire operation is aborted.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A>i <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A>metody przetwarzania transakcyjnie, żądań, tak że jeśli pojedynczy Dodaj lub usuń zakończy się niepowodzeniem, cała operacja została przerwana.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.RemoveRange%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection.AddRange%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection"> </xref> Obiektu.

trans-unit.source: certificates is .
trans-unit.target: certificatesis .
